metadata.title: CVE-2021-47258 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: core: Fix error handling of scsi_host_alloc()After device is initialized via device_initialize(), or its name is set viadev_set_name(), the device has to be freed via put_device().  Otherwisedevice name will be leaked because it is allocated dynamically indev_set_name().Fix the leak by replacing kfree() with put_device(). Sincescsi_host_dev_release() properly handles IDA and kthread removal, removespecial-casing these from the error handling as well.
